Description: Steatite ostracon with religious text in Greek.
Curator's comments: A panegyric on a martyred bishop.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.137, pl.99)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (65435) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/65435)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 99:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2025)
